Subject: A Dark Situation
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

He turned to Feline.
"I have a plan, for Optimus. I'll have to take a trip, I want you to
come with me." He started working with the computer.
"Darn, Prime is in Pred area. We cant go after him, without being
slaged." He went back to her. "That plan of mine will have to wait,
untill he is in the open, and away from Preds. So what do you think we
should do, to pass the time?" He put his arms around her, one hand on
her lower back, the other wraped around her back, to her left shoulder.
He kissed her.
